name: Bahasa Arab Tahun 1 (AR)
description:
This app providing various unique and cool features for Arabic Alphabet learning, make it more interactive and fun for kids!

it has 150+ of Augmented Reality content that shown an example of the Arabic words and also completed by audio features to inform how the words should sounds. 

to make the learning experience more fun this app also has various form of interactive quiz for kids including educational games to make it more joyful and entertaining.

Unique Features :

- 150 + of Augmented Reality content

- Educational Games

- Interactive Quiz

To Accesss the Augmented Reality content, scan the images on "BAHASA ARAB TAHUN 1 BUKU TEKS" at the Letters Example section.
